snippet: The Heritage Foundation is holding a two-day policy conference next week that is aimed at nudging Republicans toward a more aggressive agenda.
abstract: Conservative research institute Heritage Foundation is planning to hold two-day policy conference to urge House and Senate Republicans toward bolder and more assertive agenda as they prepare for joint retreat.
lead_paragraph: The Heritage Foundation is holding a two-day policy conference next week that is aimed at nudging Republicans toward a more aggressive agenda.

headline.main: G.O.P. Faces Push From Right to Be Bolder
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Faces Push From Right to Be Bolder
